item.description:
Vietnamese Day
Help celebrate "Tet"- the Vietnamese Lunar New Year!
Saturday, February 13, 2010
At the Millyard Museum
10:00 a.m.-4:00 p.m.
Tour of museum: 1:00 p.m.
Reception: 2:00 p.m.

FREE Admission for members of the Vietnamese community of Manchester and surrounding towns; FREE Admission for Manchester Historic Association members; others pay regular museum admission

This year "Tet" - the Vietnamese Lunar New Year occurs on Sunday, February 14. This is one of the most important holidays for Vietnamese and Vietnamese-Americans. The Millyard Museum will celebrate the start of the Year of the Tiger on Saturday, February 13 with an open house for members of Manchester's Vietnamese community. At 1:00 p.m. Aurore Eaton, Executive Director, will give a guided tour of the Millyard Museum, and at 2 p.m. there will be a reception in the Discovery Gallery, featuring light refreshments. Manchester Historic Association members and the general public are invited to share in these activities!

Please note: Pre-registration is not required.
item.name: Help celebrate 'Tet" - the Vietnamese Lunar New Year!
